title: game shut down while in champion
body: game shut down while i was in champion select ow i cant connect to my chat? wtf riot

replies.body: Are you still experiencing this issue?  While there were some server issues, they were specifically with chat so your game shutting down could be a result of something else.  Were there any error messages?  Let me know!
There is a chat issue affecting NA servers. You can check for updates on the client or launcher signified by a /!\ sign or here ( http://status.leagueoflegends.com/ ).
